result.title: Can't copy-paste my code while submitting it !
result.content:
I can't paste my code in the 'Source Code' field. Anyone else with the problem ? I know I can upload a file for submission, but that ruins my experience. I'm disappointed. I'm out of today's contest !

If its only me who's facing the problem, please help !

EDIT : Guys I asked for help ! Please downvote, but at least explain ! Am I the only one faccing the problem ?
